sub_title: Senior Product Manager at Booking.com  |  MBA Candidate at Cardiff Met. |  Product Management Evangelist, Speaker & Mentor | The Product.Live Podcast
summary: Passionate about cooking up new products to make people’s lives easier and simpler, I am a Product Evangelist with more than 13 years of experience in the fields of Product, Project and Operations Management in ML/AI, FoodTech, FinTech, Risk Analysis, Supply Chain, Digital, Governmental, and Travel industries in multiple locations across Europe, Middle East, Southern Africa & India. I have also been involved with several product management consulting, mentoring and coaching initiatives with various organisations, besides pursuing an MBA degree at Cardiff Metropolitan University.

projects.title: Hashtags Magazine
projects.description:
Co-Founder / Business Development 

A contemporary online magazine that covers various topics which include the latest about new technologies, business and marketing, lifestyle and fashion, entertainment, music, movies and TV shows.

Responsible mainly for the business development side by promoting the magazine online and offline through direct and indirect campaigns, studying the best methods to develop the magazine in regards to technical features, services, user experience and content management, attracting potential advertisers and contributors and setting and finalizing partnership and sponsorship deals. Another secondary role is reviewing, selecting, editing & publishing posts & articles on the magazine.

projects.title: Simplicity Egypt - Business Solutions Group
projects.description:
Co-Founder / Managing Partner
A self-established business that offered various services through 3 main divisions that were E-Business Solutions, Marketing and Corporate Identity Solutions and Financial Solutions 

As a general manager I was responsible for handling day to day operations of the whole entity & tackling any obstacles in order to sustain a stable workflow, planning and following up on product development, marketing, sales, financial strategies in order to meet the strategic plan’s objectives, handling various accounts management to meet clients’ requirements, proposals development, contracting procedures, managing projects, project delivery, closure and support.

On other side I held the responsibility of E-Business Solutions Department Head & UI Development Team Leader directly handling projects management, implementation & delivery.

profile_positions.description: Product School is a global leader in Product Management training with a community of over one million product professionals. As a featured speaker, I help inspire the next generation of Product Managers to create innovative products and apply best practices in their work.
profile_positions.title: Featured Speaker

profile_positions.description: Delivering offline & online mentorship & coaching sessions on Product Management to aspiring talents.
profile_positions.title: Product Management Mentor

profile_positions.description: Leading the User Support Squad operating under the Post Order Happiness Domain of the Order Fulfillment Tribe. Discovering and delivering solutions to provide the best support experience to our users, whether by providing internal tools to our Customer Care teams, or by empowering customers with automated flows and guided experiences promoting self care across their journey.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager II - User Support

profile_positions.description:
FinTech/RegTech Product Manager with JumiaPay Fraud Risk and Payments teams.

JumiaPay is a payment platform that allows African customers to transact online and access digital and financial services aiming to revolutionize the payment environment in Africa by allowing our customers to transact securely online with local payment methods, offering financial and digital products online & enabling new sellers/merchants to enter the African market without worrying about the payment barriers.

JumiaPay is part of Jumia, and is backed by MTN, Millicom, Rocket Internet, AXA, Orange, CDC, Mastercard and Goldman Sachs.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager - Fraud Risk & Payments, JumiaPay

profile_positions.description: Leading logistic operations & finance software products serving B2B ecommerce supply chain marketplace acting as a wholesale distribution center for on demand orders of FMCG retailers in Egypt’s most under-served geographies. We own and operate our full stack tech-driven supply chain and logistics to provide warehousing and fulfillment solutions to our sellers and storefront delivery to our customers.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager - Operations Platform

profile_positions.description:
Planning, managing and overseeing the execution of scope expansion plans alongside to managing and overseeing the operational execution of our ongoing products in multiple international locations such as India, Italy, Mozambique, Zimbabwe & South Africa among others.

Cross World Challenges is a global leader in creating and managing worldwide sport and adventure events. In the past few years the company has created successful rally series like “Cross Egypt Challenge” that grabbed international attention with 1000+ featured articles, TV and radio interviews and over 350 million followers worldwide. The company has also created “Cross Arabia Challenge”, “Cross India Challenge”, “Cross Africa Challenge” and “Cross Europe Challenge” and is currently involved in developing unique adventure concepts in different parts around the planet.

www.crossworldchallenges.com

profile_positions.title: IT Project Manager

profile_positions.description: As a Product Manager, I am responsible for general planning for the product development according to customer & market needs,  assessing the market, developing  a strategic plan highlighting a roadmap for the product with specific timeline, milestones & deliverables, develop a product releasing plan by targeting customer functional & technical requirements, set the standards for designing & developing the product along with testing & quality assurance policies to get it ready for commercial release, planning  & following up marketing plans & following up sales & presales activities whether it is within Egypt (Alexandria, Cairo, Portsaid, Suez, Damietta & Sharm El Sheikh) or exploring & communicating with new markets outside Egypt (Libya, UAE & Qatar)
profile_positions.title: Product Manager - Shipping & Logistics Ops

profile_positions.description: As Business Analyst / Product Specialist for a specific software that is specialized in handling the daily operations & financials for shipping agency companies, I am responsible for engagement with clients after finalizing project contract & handling the analysis, testing, training & support phases of the SDLC; Also assisting with the design phase.
